name: MINOS: a maze
description:
MINOS is a game developed for the Game Boy. I fished it out of an ice lake.

THE PRINCE HAS BEEN LOCKED IN THE LABYRINTH BY HIS WICKED FATHER!

Navigate through the maze, collect drachma, and save your BOYFRIEND!

Be careful; for when the lights go out, the disembodied head of the Minotaur haunts the maze (maybe it’s just a bull’s head?)! Light the torches and choose your path WISELY!

Slightly water damaged.
